name: The Dragonstar Trilogy Part III
description:
A very traditional text adventure, which the author described as "Classic Adventure", but without the interesting bits".

The interface is text driven with only a handful of illustrations for some of the locations. The text parser uses simple verb/noun for commands.

This is the third part of the The Dragonstar Trilogy a self-published series by Delta 4.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
